# Vulpkanin
Vulpkanin are fox-human hybrids, sporting distinct ears and tails.
## Diet
Vulpkanin share evolutionary roots with foxes, and so they cannot metabolize Theobromine or Allicin. Be careful when eating chocolate, onions, or garlic, and avoid coffee and tea!
## Claws
Vulpkanin have dull claws, which do a mixture of [color=orange]Blunt[/color] and [color=orange]Slashing[/color] damage.
## Fur
Vulpkanin fur provides some slight insulation against [color=red]hot[/color] and [color=cornflowerblue]cold[/color] environments, but not enough to protect against a raging fire or the vacuum of space.
## Vulpkanin Naming Conventions
Vulpkanin have similar names to the humanoid species, but are typically more guttural and harsh.
[bullet] Hugo Meissner
[bullet] Cadog Thalassa
[bullet] Emery Kamphaus
